name: Dice Confrontation
description:
A 2-player tug-of-war dice game.

Objective:
Be the player that wins 2 of the 3 battles on the battlefield be having their sum of dice being higher than their opponents after a set amount of turns.

Controls:
Left mouse button: Select dice/targets/locations etc.
Right mouse button: View die info.

Game flow
The game is divided into 2 phases. The draft phase and the battle phase.

Draft phase
Each player will get to draft a bag of 20 dice to use in the battle from a random selection.

Battle phase
Each player will take turns drawing a hand of 5 dice and use them on the battlefield. You can place soldier dice in the battles and then use boost dice to change their values. You will also get bonuses if you have soldiers of the same color and/or values.
